metadata.dc:author: Motta, J
Navarro, D
Chen, L F
metadata.dc:description: We report the experience at Gorgas Army Hospital with myocardial perfusion studies by single-photon emission tomography. We describe the technique, the specificity and sensitivity, and its use in the diagnosis, evaluation of extension and prognosis of coronary artery disease.
metadata.dc:title: Estudios de perfusión miocárdica durante el esfuerzo y reposo efectuados en el Hospital Militar Gorgas (HMG).
[Myocardial perfusion studies during exertion and rest performed at the Hospital Militar Gorgas (HMG)].
